scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n gooal -o build/gooal-foo.js -- src/main.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/gooalcharts.js -c -m -o build/gooalcharts.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/gooal-foo.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/goal-foo.js build/gooal-foo.min.js
